title: Mini Cheese Balls Covered in Zibas with Taqueritos
ingredients: 1Zibas Papitas Bag creams and crushed spices
instructions: Step 1. In a bowl mixes the cream cheese with cheddar cheese, garlic salt, bacon, chives and paprika.
Step 2. Form balls with this mixture and cover them with crushed zibas.
Step 3. Place the balls on a tray and let them cool for 1 hour.
Step 4. Before serving, place a taqueritos in the center of each ball and serve.
